detaileddescription.para: This document contains the Software Detailed Design documentation for the subfunctionality HardwareVersion which is part Chorus_HSI functionality.

Describes the detailed design of the HardwareVersion subfunctionality as defined in the SWA along with all allocated SWRs for this component. Design elements for requirements only partially allocated to this component will only cover that part.
This includes the following design elements:
Decomposition of SW component into files including allocation of C-functions to files.
Internal interaction of the SW units and variant dependencies.
Dynamic behavior among SW units on the software component level.
Description of C-functions in natural language along with UML activity diagrams and design decisions.
Text-based description of content and usage for the global and member data (variables, structs, enums, unions, defines, etc.).
